programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor head down to Key West to join Captain Brandon Cyr for some skinny water bonefishing.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor fish the Lower Keys with Captain Brandon Cyr for baby tarpon in the mangroves.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor take Sergeant Major (r) Jamey Caldwell fishing out of Hawks Cay for some grouper and tarpon action in the Florida Keys.

programme.title: Flats Class
programme.desc: Ca heads to Murrells Inlet, SC for some low country lure slingin'. What's on your menu? Shrimp and grits or Flounder?

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: Similar to any good Cajun dish, a successful duck camp requires preparation. The last day on dry land is filled with essential stops to get ready for 5 days on the Bayou. Whether making sure we have the right ingredients for our favorite meals, or getting the boats brushed up and ready for action, the day before can be just as important as the day of.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Capt. Scott Walker and Capt. Steve Rodger join Capt. Brain Wilson in Galveston, TX for some hot Red Snapper action.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Capt. Scott Walker and Capt. Steve Rodger go north for a change to sight fish tripletails in Florida Bay.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Capt. Scott Walker and Capt. Steve Rodger head to the hump on a windy day to target tunas and find some bonus mahis and tripletails as well.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Being consistently productive on the water means knowing how to adapt to conditions. Capt. Scott Walker and Capt. Steve Rodger switch it up and fish shallow for sailfish.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Capt. Scott Walker and Capt. Steve Rodger launch from the incomparable Oceans Edge Resort in Key West, Florida to hunt down all kinds of sport fish.

programme.title: Into The Blue
programme.desc: Capt. Scott Walker and Capt. Steve Rodger take off from the beautiful Ocean's Edge Marina in Key West, Florida.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton makes a trip to South Carolina to fish Lake Murray. He meets up with the Rather Outdoors crew to spend time on the water and at the Rather HQ checking out all the gear from Lews and Strike King.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Crew is chasing Tarpon in Tampa Florida with Ryan Harrington. After a few close calls and grinding out the long days, they finally catch up to the Silver King.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: The Southards continue their family tradition on Table Rock Lake. While they’re there, Trenton spends a day with “Mr. Worldwide” James Watson and learns some things from one of the best anglers on the lake.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: With a free day before Icast. Trenton and Ryan go offshore to try and fill the cooler. Catching a variety of species and hoping to get their hands on a hogfish.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and Anna set out for a last minute fishing trip that runs a little late. They take a quick detour to the parent pick up line to get the kids from school, and head back out on the water to see what’s biting!

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh takes his friend Isaiah to the blue water as they look for destin's latest hot bite, the blackfin tuna.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and George from Two Georges Marina battle the wind and tide on a tough day of fishing which leads Josh to fish another day, solely for revenge on the Sheepshead!

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Join Captain Josh and Sheriff Eric Aden for a day of fishing and fun in Destin, Florida. These two friends hit the water, catching fish both offshore and inshore, and reeling in some impressive catches. With plenty of laughs, great stories, and a few surprises along the way, this episode is all about the joy of fishing and the bond between two guys who love the sea.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Fishing with the Mayor Description: Join the Major of destin as he ventures into the world of coastal fishing, leaving the city behind for a day of fun and unexpected challenges. With plenty of laughs and surprising twists, this episode showcases the Mayor in a whole new light.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Join Josh Calhoon on Goin’ Coastal TV as he takes Big Gus on one of the most epic topwater bites ever caught on camera!

programme.desc: A bored Italian socialite abandons her jet-set lifestyle for the rigors and rewards of rural Kenya in this true story based on a best-selling memoir.

programme.title: The China Syndrome
programme.desc: A news reporter (Jane Fonda) and her cameraman (Michael Douglas) are unintentional witnesses to a SCRAM incident, an emergency core shutdown procedure at a nuclear power plant in California. The crew prevents a catastrophe, but the plant supervisor (Jack Lemmon) begins to suspect the plant is in violation of safety standards, and tries desperately to bring it to the attention of the public, fearing that another SCRAM incident will produce an atomic disaster.

programme.title: Striking Distance
programme.desc: Bruce Willis and Sarah Jessica Parker star in this crime thriller about a demoted homicide cop who works with his partner to find his father’s killer.

programme.title: Random Hearts
programme.desc: After losing their loved ones in a plane crash, a cop and a congresswoman discover their spouses were having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Murphy's Romance
programme.desc: After moving to small-town Arizona and falling for an older widowed pharmacist, a divorcée with a 12-year old son gets an unwanted visit from her ex.

programme.title: Heartsounds
programme.desc: A near-fatal heart attack sends a New York urologist and his writer wife into a battle against a medical institution unable or unwilling to help him.

programme.title: To Gillian on Her 37th Birthday
programme.desc: After the death of his loving wife, David is torn by grief, and has been fixating on her spirit. Now he must let go of her in order to move on.

programme.title: North
programme.desc: After a judge allows him to sever ties to his work-obsessed parents, a boy embarks on an international quest for the quintessential set of parents.

programme.title: Little Secrets
programme.desc: A pre-teen violin virtuoso tries to fund her dreams by setting up a booth in her backyard where she hears and keeps young people’s deepest secrets.

programme.title: Life Without Dick
programme.desc: After shooting her boyfriend, she meets the hitman who had been planning to kill him. As the two dispose of his body, romantic sparks begin to fly.

programme.title: Family Business
programme.desc: A Westinghouse scholar recruits his criminal grandpa and reformed criminal dad to steal plasma from a research lab and share in the $1 million reward.

programme.title: S.I.S.
programme.desc: An elite police squad hunts down the worst criminals in Los Angeles, but they may have met their match when they track a notorious, volatile killer.

programme.title: A Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: When an Arizona astronomer discovers a comet heading toward Earth, the president attempts to divert it by using a nuclear missile.

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: Harrison Ford portrays a Vietnam vet and U.S President whose Air Force One flight with the First Family is hijacked by a terrorist bent on revenge.

programme.title: From Here to Eternity
programme.desc: A World War II classic about the violence, quarrels, and romantic intrigue affecting a group of soldiers at Pearl Harbor before the tragic attack.

programme.title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
programme.desc: When the idealistic young Jefferson Smith (James Stewart) winds up appointed to the United States Senate, he gains the mentorship of Senator Joseph Paine (Claude Rains). However, Paine isn't as noble as his reputation would indicate, and he becomes involved in a scheme to discredit Smith, who wants to build a boys' campsite where a more lucrative project could go. Determined to stand up against Paine and his corrupt peers, Smith takes his case to the Senate floor.

programme.title: You Were Never Lovelier
programme.desc: Bob Davis (Fred Astaire), an American dancer in Buenos Aires, Argentina, finds himself desperate for work after losing all his money. He takes a gig at a wedding, hoping to impress the bride's father, Eduardo Acuña (Adolphe Menjou), a local club owner who has decreed that his daughters must marry in order of age. Eduardo eventually agrees to allow Bob to perform at his club, but only under the condition that he play suitor to his second-oldest daughter, the beautiful Maria (Rita Hayworth).

programme.title: The Trouble with Angels
programme.desc: A Reverend Mother faces an uphill battle to reform a pair of young, hard-to-reach troublemakers who’ve been wreaking havoc on her convent school.

programme.title: Let Us Live
programme.desc: When a confused eyewitness identifies New York City cabbie Brick Tennant (Henry Fonda) as a killer, he is sentenced to death for a murder that he wasn't involved in. Though no one is willing to listen to the innocent prisoner's pleas for freedom, Brick's faithful fiancée, Mary (Maureen O'Sullivan), knows that her lover is innocent -- because she was with him when the crime was committed. As the scheduled execution draws ever nearer, Mary begins to investigate the murder herself.

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: In a Connecticut suburb, Ned notices there are pools throughout the neighborhood and decides to "swim" home via the pools of his wealthy friends.

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: This Academy Award winner for Best Picture tells the story of an idealistic Southern politician brought down by his own ambition and lust for power.

programme.title: The Whole Truth
programme.desc: Bored with his marriage, a movie producer has an affair with a temperamental actress. When she ends up murdered, all clues point to him as the killer.

programme.title: What a Woman!
programme.desc: An author (Willard Parker) and a literary agent (Rosalind Russell) become involved after selling film rights to his racy book.

programme.title: Decameron Nights
programme.desc: While trying to woo a noblewoman in Florence, Italian poet Boccaccio tells three tales of love in this romance based on the author's writings.

programme.title: The Fuller Brush Man
programme.desc: Clumsy sanitation worker Red Jones (Red Skelton) is fired from his street-cleaning job shortly after his girlfriend, Ann Elliot (Janet Blair), refuses his marriage proposal until he betters himself. While training to become a door-to-door salesman, he accidentally stumbles into a murder investigation when the corrupt sanitation commissioner (Nicholas Joy) who had fired him is killed. When the murder weapon is found to be one of the brushes Red sells, he must fight to prove his innocence.

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: During WW II, Lt. Rip Crandall and his inexperienced and motley crew get assigned to deliver an Australian observer to a Japanese-held island.

programme.title: It Should Happen to You
programme.desc: A young model finds her dreams of fame coming true when she rents billboards in New York to advertise herself, attracting fans and two rival suitors.

programme.title: Under the Yum-Yum Tree
programme.desc: The machinations of a lusty landlord threaten the bliss of a couple trying to determine their character compatibility by living together platonically.

programme.title: There's Always a Woman
programme.desc: An investigator for the district attorney and his amateur sleuth wife compete to solve a murder mystery behind the death of a woman's husband.

programme.title: Where Angels Go...Trouble Follows
programme.desc: A bus trip for the girls of St. Francis Academy in Pennsylvania takes a radical detour on its way to an interfaith youth rally in California.

programme.title: Our Man in Havana
programme.desc: A vacuum cleaner salesman is recruited as a spy by the British secret service. Despite his phony reports and lies, he quickly gains importance.

programme.title: Doctor Faustus
programme.desc: Frustrated with the limits of his knowledge, Dr. Faustus calls upon Lucifer and offers his soul in return for 24 years of hedonism and invincibility.

programme.title: It Had to Be You
programme.desc: Society girl Victoria Stafford (Ginger Rogers) garners a reputation for leaving men at the altar. Getting engaged for a fourth time, Victoria believes she's found the right man -- until on a train she has a strange dream about a Native American who claims that he is her true love. Awakening, Victoria is startled to find the dream man, George (Cornel Wilde), who claims to really exist, while also being a figment of her imagination. Back at home, George guides Victoria to a startling discovery.

programme.title: The Heroes of Telemark
programme.desc: In German-occupied Norway in 1942, a resistance group attempts to sabotage the Nazi's production of essential atomic bomb components.

programme.title: Murderer's Row
programme.desc: Secret agent Matt Helm must rescue the kidnapped inventor of an ultra-destructive "helio beam" capable of destroying Washington, D.C.

programme.title: Diamond Head
programme.desc: A wealthy Hawaiian pineapple plantation owner and bigoted bully with political ambitions flatly refuses to allow his young sister to marry a native.

programme.title: The Solid Gold Cadillac
programme.desc: A small stockholder-turned-corporate heroine ousts a crooked Board of Trustees and reinstates an honest director, falling in love along the way.

programme.title: Miss Sadie Thompson
programme.desc: In postwar Honolulu, a former sex worker finds herself courted by a love-struck Marine as a religious zealot sets his sights on reforming her.

programme.title: Cripple Creek
programme.desc: A federal agent (George Montgomery) and two colleagues infiltrate a gang of gold-rush gold smugglers.

programme.title: The Desperadoes
programme.desc: Sheriff Steve Upton (Randolph Scott) is a devoted lawman who works tirelessly to keep order in his small town, nestled within the Utah territory. So, when Cheyenne Rogers (Glenn Ford), an old friend with a criminal past, rolls into town, Upton is immediately on edge. Cheyenne assures his pal that all that's behind him now. But when the town bank is robbed, Cheyenne becomes the locals' number one suspect. He'll have to prove his innocence to save himself and his friend's reputation.

programme.title: The Doolins of Oklahoma
programme.desc: Old West outlaw Bill Doolin (Randolph Scott) marries a deacon's wife, but his gang will not leave him alone.

programme.title: The Outlaws Is Coming
programme.desc: Moe, Larry and Curly Joe (Adam West) bring their head-knocking, eye-gouging antics to the Wild West. When reporter Kenneth Cabot (Nancy Kovack) heads to Wyoming to stop the slaughter of buffaloes, he brings the stooges with him. There, they trade barbs with Billy the Kid, Jesse James and Wild Bill Hickock, while Cabot gets elected town sheriff. But they'll need some help from Annie Oakley (Mort Mills) when it comes to foiling the criminal plans of a land-hungry frontier villain.

programme.title: Alvarez Kelly
programme.desc: Alvarez Kelly (William Holden) is a Mexican cattle rancher who is doing his best to stay out of the Civil War. He has no interest in which side may win or lose -- Kelly is far more concerned about his own survival, and about making money. He soon finds himself in the middle of the conflict, however, when a confederate colonel (Richard Widmark) captures the rancher and forces Kelly to help his soldiers steal a nearby herd of cattle, which they desperately need for food.

programme.title: The Longest Drive
programme.desc: After a decade apart, a pair of brothers reunites to find their long-lost sister, who was kidnapped as a child and is now living with a native tribe.

programme.title: J.W. Coop
programme.desc: After spending a decade behind bars for writing bad checks and punching a cop, former rodeo star J.W. Coop (Cliff Robertson) re-enters a world drastically different from how he left it; the only constant seems to be his mother (Geraldine Page). Gradually coming to terms with societal changes and cultural norms, Coop is determined to climb back to the top spot on the rodeo circuit. Along the way, he hooks up with Bean (Cristina Ferrare), a liberated woman who helps him catch up to modern life.

programme.title: Count Three and Pray
programme.desc: After fighting for the Union during the Civil War, Luke Fargo (Van Heflin) is greeted with resentment when he returns home to his small southern town. Luke has a reputation as a rogue, but he's reinvented himself as a man of God and plans to fix up the town's damaged church. Recalling their romantic past, Georgina Decrais (Allison Hayes) tries to reclaim Luke. But, to the dismay of some suspicious townspeople, he concentrates on mentoring an unsophisticated young woman, Lissy (Joanne Woodward).

programme.title: Scalplock
programme.desc: A frontier gambler (Dale Robertson) wins a railroad in a card game and has to keep it going as people try to take it away from him.

programme.title: Santa Fe
programme.desc: Three brothers become outlaws after the Civil War, while a fourth sibling goes to work for the railroad.

programme.title: The Man From Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: Ex-convict gunfighters join a state ranger (Bill Elliott) on patrol for outlaws.

programme.title: Major Dundee
programme.desc: During the end of the Civil War, Major Dundee guards Confederate prisoners, Union deserters and ordinary hard-bitten criminals in a remote fort. When Apaches attack the fort and make off with three children, Dundee must set up a posse including Confederates, who face a choice between joining up or being shot. The feud between Dundee and Tyreen is also heated up by a sultry Mexican widow.

programme.title: The Palomino
programme.desc: Steve Norris (Jerome Courtland), the heir to a meat-packing fortune, has a yearning to set out and forge a path of his own. His rebellious streak leads him to the broken down horse-breeding farm of the bewitching beauty Maria Guevara (Beverly Tyler). Enchanted by this determined young woman, Norris decides to assist her in saving her business. But this enrages duplicitous rival breeder Ben Lane (Roy Roberts), who steals away Guevara's prize palomino in an attempt to cripple her operation.

programme.title: The Parson and the Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid (Anthony Dexter) retires from the outlaw life, fakes his own death and adopts the name William Bonney. Soon, William runs into Jack Slade (Sonny Tufts), a gun-toting stranger who is itching for a gunfight. Jack falls in with a group of thugs terrorizing William's town. The Rev. Jericho Jones (Buddy Rogers) exhorts William to defend the townspeople, and, when William's maid, Tonya (Marie Windsor), is beaten by the thugs, he grabs his pistol.

programme.title: The Return of Wild Bill
programme.desc: Wild Bill Saunders comes home to help his father deal with troublesome ranchers.

programme.title: They Came to Cordura
programme.desc: On a mission to Mexico, U.S. Maj. Tom Thorn (Gary Cooper) is branded a coward, while several of his fellow servicemen are praised for showing bravery. Tom is asked to transport the heroes through harsh terrain so they can be honored. Also along for the journey is Adelaide Geary (Rita Hayworth), a woman charged with conspiring against the United States. But, as his fellow soldiers begin revealing their treacherous sides, Tom realizes that Adelaide is the only heroic one of the bunch.

programme.title: Face of a Fugitive
programme.desc: While being escorted to jail, bank robber Jim Larson (Fred MacMurray) manages to get the upper hand on his captor and escape. Jim is surprised to see his brother appear on the scene, ready to aid his sibling. As they make their getaway, his brother and the pursuing lawman shoot each other, leaving the stunned Jim alone and on the run. Assuming a different identity, Jim travels to a mining town and befriends the local sheriff (Lin McCarthy), hoping to start over and find redemption.

programme.title: The Last Rebel
programme.desc: Two Confederates (Joe Namath, Jack Elam) save a man's (Woody Strode) life and cause trouble in 1865 Missouri.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: A wounded rancher (Randolph Scott) hides with a schoolmarm (Ellen Drew) after his ex-girlfriend's husband (Alexander Knox) runs him out of town.

programme.title: The Walking Hills
programme.desc: During a poker game in a Mexican bar, a group of men discover the location of a lost wagon train -- and its cargo of gold. To prevent one man from cheating the rest, it's decided that they will find it together. Among them are horse breeder Jim Carey (Randolph Scott) and rodeo rider Shep Wilson (William Bishop) ; like their cohorts in the treasure hunt, they share a tangled history -- Chris Jackson (Ella Raines), Shep's current sweetheart, is Jim's old flame. Greed and suspicion soon break out.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: The honorable Calem Ware (Randolph Scott), marshal of the Wild West boomtown of Medicine Bend, attempts to defuse the simmering tensions in his rapidly growing and increasingly violent town, as a greedy businessman (Warner Anderson) hires a sinister black-gloved gunman (Michael Pate) to take care of his problems with the marshal for good. Meanwhile, a traveling song-and-dance troupe arrives in town, bearing Ware's lost love, Tally (Angela Lansbury), who holds the secret to his violent past.

programme.title: Phantom Stagecoach
programme.desc: A dispute between stage lines ends with a steel-armored stagecoach.

programme.title: Cripple Creek
programme.desc: A federal agent (George Montgomery) and two colleagues infiltrate a gang of gold-rush gold smugglers.

programme.title: The Desperadoes
programme.desc: Sheriff Steve Upton (Randolph Scott) is a devoted lawman who works tirelessly to keep order in his small town, nestled within the Utah territory. So, when Cheyenne Rogers (Glenn Ford), an old friend with a criminal past, rolls into town, Upton is immediately on edge. Cheyenne assures his pal that all that's behind him now. But when the town bank is robbed, Cheyenne becomes the locals' number one suspect. He'll have to prove his innocence to save himself and his friend's reputation.

programme.title: Mackenna's Gold
programme.desc: Apaches, townsfolk, a Mexican bandit (Omar Sharif) and the cavalry follow a sheriff (Gregory Peck) to a mythical canyon of gold.

programme.title: The Hellions
programme.desc: A small-town policeman (Richard Todd) stands alone against a family of outlaws in 19th-century South Africa.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: A new bride with a heart condition becomes fearfully suspicious that her husband is a far different person than he claimed to be before they married.

programme.title: Cradle of Lies
programme.desc: Five years ago Melissa went into labor while in a coma. She has just awoken with no information about her baby girl, and so her frantic search begins.

programme.title: Crash Site: A Family In Danger
programme.desc: A Jeep crash sends a vacationing couple on a creepy trip back to safety.

programme.title: Dancing Trees
programme.desc: Martha, an autistic young woman with a talent for numbers, attempts to solve the murder of her mother with the help of her cousin.

programme.title: Romantic Friction
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a book cover artist posing as the author of a hit romance novel and the snooty writer who actually penned it under a pseudonym.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Tiny receives notice that his bar will close unless he pays $17,000 and his customers rally around him with a plan to save it; meanwhile Jay's hazing practices start to raise red flags.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Tiny receives notice that his bar will close unless he pays $17,000 and his customers rally around him with a plan to save it; meanwhile Jay's hazing practices start to raise red flags.

programme.title: Eat, Love, London
programme.desc: Stella takes a job at a new London restaurant and ends up falling for the chef.

programme.title: Planning for Joy
programme.desc: After clamming up during a morning show appearance, Hazel finds help from Theo, a handsome trivia host who gives her a few pointers.

programme.title: Falling for the Manny
programme.desc: Alice is up for partner at her firm and hires her sister’s manny, Jacob, to help with her daughter.

programme.title: The Soulmate Search
programme.desc: Lindsay and Will bond after agreeing the dating service that matched them has made a mistake.

programme.title: The Love Issue
programme.desc: A beauty editor finds a fake boyfriend when her ex-boyfriend (and boss) gets engaged.

programme.title: Love's Secret Ingredient
programme.desc: The owner of a struggling market teams up with a celebrity chef to revive each other’s reputations.

programme.title: Scented with Love
programme.desc: Paris-trained perfumer Rosalie is forced to share her new store space with furniture maker Jason.

programme.title: The Wedding Rule
programme.desc: Two childhood friends face the adventure of matrimony to inherit a treasured restaurant, unknowingly seeking their perfect match in each other.

programme.title: What We Do For Love
programme.desc: Sophie secures a job at the famous wellness firm but soon clashes with the chief life coach Jason.

programme.title: With Love, Your Sweetly Salted
programme.desc: After her bad review of a Chicago eatery goes viral, a Tribune food critic attempts to make amends by going undercover as its chef’s new prep cook.

programme.title: Write Place, Write Time
programme.desc: A woman attempts to give her dreams of being a writer one last go by anonymously providing content to her mother's declining publishing company.

programme.title: Love's Fast Lane
programme.desc: A viral video brings a female mechanic fame and romance with a publicist who’s trying to make her a host on a popular car-enthusiast talk show.

programme.title: Falling For the Competition
programme.desc: A local mom’s and dad’s group clash for the prestigious Modern Parenting Group of the Year award.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori surprises her family with a meal that transports them to Spain.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori gets breast revision surgery and throws a party to raise awareness for breast health. Time for a Booby Bash!

programme.title: Accidentally In Love
programme.desc: Edie finds true love in London just days before she is to return to the US. They are separated, but as fate would have it, they reunite 6 years later.

programme.desc: A content creator making a series about singlehood meets her match in polar-opposite, Jackson.

programme.desc: A police officer attempting to solve the murder of her son’s fiancé uncovers clues that force her to choose between her duties as a cop and a mother.

programme.desc: Twenty years after the murder of his father by the traitor Zhao Han, Meng Yang attempts to avenge him using the sacred Chengying Sword.

programme.desc: Xiaowei searches for a freely given heart in order to become human.

programme.desc: After convincing Iowa townsfolk to invest in a boys' marching band, a traveling con man's scheme is complicated by his feelings for a local librarian.

programme.desc: Natalie Wood and Warren Beatty star as two teenaged lovers navigating 1928 Kansas in this romantic drama.

programme.title: A Night At The Opera
programme.desc: A seedy theatrical agent guarantees a patron a position in high society if she bankrolls an opera, but only if he manages to sign a famous tenor.

programme.title: Please Don't Eat the Daisies
programme.desc: A family relocates from the city to the suburbs. Challenges ensue when a damaging play review leads a famed actress to target the husband.

programme.title: Barkleys of Broadway, The
programme.desc: Fred Astaire and Ginger Rogers star as a pair of stars who break up only to realize they need each other.

programme.title: Hill, The

programme.title: Shall We Dance
programme.desc: A ballet dancer tries to woo a famous tap dancer, sparking a publicity frenzy over whether the pair are secretly married in this delightful musical.

programme.title: Logan's Run
programme.desc: In a dystopian world where people face mandatory death at the age of 30, an elite police officer is tasked with hunting down those who try to escape.

programme.title: Mutiny on the Bounty (1962)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando stars as a first mate who leads his ship's exploited and abused crew through mutiny.

programme.title: What's Up, Doc?
programme.desc: When suitcases are mixed up, a chase across San Francisco follows.

programme.title: A Star Is Born

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Some of the residents of Midsomer Worthy are trying to prevent James Harrington from turning Setwale Woods into a housing estate. Led by a solicitor, Bernadette Sullivan, and a local farmer, Simon Bartlett, who also happen to be having an affair, they haven't had much success in court. When Bartlett's wife Victoria is found dead in the woods, Barnaby and Troy must first determine is if her murder is related to the planned development or something as yet unknown. The information provided by two inquisitive children, who see the investigation as a fascinating game, proves invaluable in solving the crime.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the village of Midsomer Wellow, someone is killing off the bell ringers of the parish church, in the week before a big bell-ringing competition. One young woman on the team is even shot dead in the churchyard on her wedding day.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.desc: Could a ballad made famous by late, lamented folk singer Johnny Carver be an inspiration for murder? Did someone want to kill Toby Winning for threatening to take the Little Crosby Folk Festival away from Midsomer - or is the true motive something hidden for 20 years?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The fizz goes out of a sparkling wine launch when the glasses are laced with slug poison. Who is targeting the Midsomer Vinae Winery and what does the attack have to do with the death of a child in a hit-and-run accident?

programme.title: Super Sleuths - Midsomer Murders

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The ghost village of Little Auburn has been abandoned since the war. When a young man is found murdered during its grand reopening, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter must unravel a sinister web of lies from both past and present in order to catch the killer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Bleakridge Watch patrols the streets of their remote village, exposing anyone who steps outside the law. When one of their members dies, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter uncover just how far some people will go for power...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Tensions run high in Lower Pampling as a new type of cricket threatens a century of tradition. When a star cricketer dies during a tournament, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter's investigation draws them into a dangerous game with a surprise visitor from Barnaby's past...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby investigates the murder of a boy during a traditional annual race at an exclusive private school but meets with resentment.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Causton is buzzing at the opening of a new brewery on the site of a famously cursed Abbey. But excitement turns to fear when a man is found boiled to death in one of the vats. DCI Barnaby and DS Winter are puzzled; could this really be about beer?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When Mahesh Sidana - butterfly collector and founding member of an elite IQ society - is found murdered, pinned to a wall in a manner akin to his treasured butterfly specimens, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter are thrust into a crime that impacts not only on their community, but internationally. With the help of an old friend, can they catch the culprit before another victim is found...?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Carver Valley’s comic festival is in full swing when the village is shocked by the murder of a former supermodel. With a scathing comic shaming several villagers as the only lead, Barnaby and Winter are left trying to separate fact from fiction.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby gets to relive his former days of sporting glory when a death at the local Rugby Club sends Barnaby and Winter into a muddle of rucks, old grudges, new romances… and artisanal chocolates?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby is less than impressed when Sarah drags him to a family friend’s wedding. But things soon go from bad to worse when tragedy strikes and Barnaby is called into action to catch a murderer with an apparent penchant for local brides.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Things take a gruesome turn when Ferrabees Circus comes to town, bringing with it a chain of sinister clown sightings, threatening notes and deathly dangerous circus acts. Barnaby will have to face up to his fears in order to solve the case

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The appearance of a headless horseman at Quitewell Hall foreshadows a number of deaths amongst an aristocratic family. In the midst of a Civil War re-enactment the family relive their own historic battles with their hostile neighbours. But what is the truth about the DeQuettevilles - and the ghostly rider?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a barrister is killed in Midsomer, suspicion falls on convicted murderer Grady Felton. Grady has just returned to the village where he committed the murder years ago amid much anger from locals. But Grady has a solid alibi. Barnaby suspects he is working with an accomplice - until Grady himself is targeted in an arson attack.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The murder of a journalist has chilling echoes of a 1960s horror film starring Midsomer's own Stella Harris. When Stella's more famous sister returns after a 40-year family rift, the killings escalate, each of them reminiscent of a movie plot. Is life - and death - imitating art?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As darkness covers Midsomer Stanton during a total eclipse of the sun, amateur astronomer Jeremy Harper is killed by a blow to the head with a meteorite. Barnaby and Jones soon discover intrigue, sexual tension and academic rivalry are rife among the star-seeking community.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Harriet Farmer wakes up after being in a coma since the night she tried to elope. Soon afterwards, a killer strikes members of a chess club. Could the attack which left Harriet for dead a year ago be linked to moves on a chess board? And where is her boyfriend Finn?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A woman is crushed to death with a giant round of cheese at the home of the world-famous Midsomer Blue. Secret and controversial plans to modernise the dairy are revealed while rumours about private lives of the parents cause a row at the prestigious local prep school. As other people linked to the dairy meet agonising deaths, long-held secrets start to emerge...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's Christmas and new detective Charlie Nelson moves into Midsomer. He's thrown straight into an intriguing mystery in the village of Morton Shallows. A man is fatally stabbed with an antique sword during a ghost-hunting party at a "haunted" manor house. Can Barnaby and Nelson find a more earthly motive behind the murder and trap the killer?

programme.title: Counting Cars

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny takes on a Route 66-inspired Chevy for the famed highway's biggest fan, and later teams up with his good buddy, American Restoration's Rick Dale.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: A high wire performer wants Danny to build a bike to commemorate his career and the records he has broken.

programme.title: Counting Cars

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: A customer is brought to tears when the shop presents him with a chopper dedicated to his lost mother.

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: After two blown sales, Danny finally gets to customize a 1960 Chevy Delivery the way he wants to.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Jason Rygaard races to clear a hillside in time to fill four logging trucks; Jay R Harkness fights to control the untethered Tigercat on a steep, snow-covered mountainside; Bucking Billy and his son Hogan battle a forest of hang-ups and widow-makers.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Four companies of loggers risk their lives to chop down timber while dealing with mechanical failures, brutal weather and rugged terrain in the Pacific Northwest.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: J.M. Browning strives to meet a big deadline; Stump Branch Logging tempts fate by jury-rigging old equipment; Gustafson races the weather to build an access road; Pihl Logging hauls in the forest's cash crop.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The loggers race to stay one step ahead of a storm approaching the Oregon coast; Jesse pushes his crew to meet their deadline; muddy roads trap Stump Branch trucks; Robby battles for control; lumber market slump.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Some crews shut down while others struggle to stay afloat after stormy weather arrives with a vengeance; the stalled housing market hits home for the loggers.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The news of upcoming layoffs worries the men; Gustafson Logging tries to get back on track; Browning races to meet a big deadline; Pihl Logging is under pressure to finish its Pig Farm job.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Two of Oregon's logging giants, J.M. Browning and Gustafson Logging, fight to survive; Jay Browning must make tough decisions; smaller outfits find winning strategies.

programme.title: Ax Men

programme.desc: The loggers barely survive in a plummeting market; the Gustafson bosses have a close call; an old hook-tender returns to the Browning team, halting Jesse's rise to management; Pihl loses a crucial member of the team.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A 1547 edition of "The Dance of Death;" two sculptures from Dr. Seuss' taxidermy collection; a tear-gas baton.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A custom Fender quad guitar; a Wheaties box featuring Tonya Harding; two steelyard scales from the 1700s.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A 19th century sun dial cannon; a signed helmet from one of Hollywood's biggest flops, "Heaven's Gate;" sterling silver baby figurines; a 1964 Beatles board game.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A 1944 steel cent; an 1850s calendar clock shows up; a H.R Giger lithograph from the film "Alien 3;" a Smokey the Bear puppet.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A cast-signed helmet from the TV series "Lost in Space;" a pair of sneakers signed by retired NBA player Robert Parish; a mystery object that cause Rick and Corey to scratch their heads.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A 1769 set of playing cards with a hidden political message enters the shop; Corey checks out a set of "Charlie's Angels" figurines; Rick examines an antique stained glass lamp.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Eighteenth-century engravings of the Spanish Armada; wax recordings from the 1890s; a Coca-Cola robot from the 1980s; a 1900s Teddy Roosevelt Bears pitcher.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A 1950s Chrysler Town & Country Newport; a cubist painting by New Zealand artist Louise Henderson; antique railroad locks from the late 1800s; an early-1900s self-heating gasoline iron.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A Monet landscape brushes into the shop and Rick decides what it is actually worth; an old firefighter station is brought in by a customer.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A test piece of Howard Hughes' Spruce Goose flies into the shop; pictures of celebrities painted by Stephen Fishwick.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A poker cheating device finds its way into the shop. Find out if the guys cash in their chips and score, or are forced to fold.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A pair of tickets to the Beatles film, "A Hard Day's Night" is brought in to the shop; an 1850s Indian Peace Medal.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A Confederate children's schoolbook reports to the shop. Find out if the guys get an 'A' in negotiating or if they drop out.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: One of Dr. J's supposed game-worn sneakers steps into the shop. Find out if the guys score a slam dunk.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A Ronco pocket fisherman is spotted in the shop, find out if Rick is able to reel in this rod; a Babe Ruth signature glove.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A first edition of Mark Twain's "A Yankee in King Arthur's Court" enters the shop; a 1953 "Peter Pan" animation; Rick speaks to a college class.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Artwork from a famous graffiti artist enters the shop; Chumlee takes on negotiations for a Civil War utility tool; Rick takes his daughter car shopping.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick deals for a cigar box which used to belong to JFK; a Civil War-era photograph's authenticity is in question; Rick surprises the staff with a trip.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A painting from Salvador Dali's Divine Comedy series makes it way into the shop; Rick deals for a note signed by Edmund Hillary; the guys debate gift-giving.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A Space 2005 wristwatch enters the shop; Rick checks out a 1964 VW Karmann Ghia; Chumlee accidentally puts rare coins into the store's slot machine.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Hand-drawn maps from the Normandy invasion enter the shop; Rick negotiates for a coin featuring Roman Emperor Caligula; Rick tries to build a house for his daughter's dog.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party for the sale of their 5 millionth duck call, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring and is forced to come up with a game plan of how to approach and appease Missy.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie calls the team into work on a Saturday afternoon for an HR training session, but the seminar quickly dissolves from unproductive to complete disaster.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dying his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis. Jase's help turns into a competition amongst the Robertson brothers to see who is most fit.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii.

programme.desc: A compilation of the best scenes from all 11 seasons of A&E's hit series Duck Dynasty.

programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous "Black Panther,"

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane" to different places.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a planned date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from--Godwin's House.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Si shows up to work on a mobility scooter, claiming to have an invisible injury from a fender bender with Willie. After losing her beloved turtle "Mr. T", Ms.Kay enlists Phil on a mission to find a new pet turtle.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Si discovers Youtube, and, after watching a series of instructional videos, decides he can make something better.

programme.desc: The Robertsons host a Halloween event at Duck Commander, where they all come together to transform the warehouse into a "scarehouse."

programme.desc: When Willie is looking to hire a new assistant, Korie insists he interview her cousin, JD. Willie is hesitant at first, but immediately hits it off with JD, who truly appreciates Willie's sense of humor.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After seeing footage Jep shot using a GoPro, Si decides he wants to use the camera to record a day in his life. But when Si gets on the guys nerves while they're hunting, they kick him and his GoPros out of the blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old GI Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep them selves.

programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works.

programme.title: Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition
programme.desc: With only seven dancers left in the competition, the pressure is at a fever-pitch. One mom is overwhelmed as she deals with competition demands as well as personal problems.

programme.title: Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition
programme.desc: It s Witches, Wolves and Wicked Stepmothers, this week when the dancers enter the land of fairy tales. But for one mother and daughter, their fantasy of being the ultimate dancer comes to an end.

programme.title: Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition
programme.desc: Only three dancers remain for the grueling final round of this life changing competition. With $100,000 and a scholarship to the Joffrey School of Ballet in New York on the line, the three remaining girls must dance for their lives.

programme.title: Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition
programme.desc: This week, the 10 remaining dancers are assigned duets based on "American Extremes." One of the classically trained dancers struggles during her hip-hop duet. Meanwhile, another contestant's role in the group dance forces her to share painful memories with her fellow dancers. Plus, one mother's meddling threatens to send a team home.

programme.title: Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition
programme.desc: The nine remaining dancers are thrilled when they learn the theme for this week s performance is "Broadway." But when two mothers at odds team up, everyone prepares for the worst.

programme.title: Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition
programme.desc: After winning the right to pick all the dance assignments for the week, one mother takes this week's skill, survival, to heart.

programme.title: Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition
programme.desc: With only seven dancers left in the competition, the pressure is at a fever-pitch. One mom is overwhelmed as she deals with competition demands as well as personal problems.

programme.title: Abby's Studio Rescue
programme.desc: Abby heads to Warwick, RI to help a struggling dance studio, but finds that the owner is missing and too anxious to even come to her own studio. With dance moms at each others' throats and a building in disrepair.

programme.title: Abby's Studio Rescue
programme.desc: Abby heads to Northridge, CA, to help another dance studio in trouble, but when the owner takes offense to Abby's tough love critique, she kicks Abby out and a battle ensues.

programme.title: Abby's Studio Rescue
programme.desc: Abby arrives in Shelton, CT, and finds a studio owner in total denial about the problems at her studio. Abby enlists the help of Maddie, Mackenzie, Kendall and Nia from Dance Moms to show her the error of her ways, but are the problems at the studio too great for her to overcome?

programme.title: Abby's Studio Rescue
programme.desc: Abby heads to Dance Legacy in Indianapolis, IN where she finds an overbearing studio owner at war with her irresponsible daughter over studio operations. Students are leaving due to the tension and unprofessional atmosphere and if Abby can't help this dueling mother-daughter duo come to terms, Dance Legacy will surely have to close its doors.

programme.title: Abby's Studio Rescue
programme.desc: Abby heads to Indiana, and finds a dance studio whose owner is neglecting the other kids to focus on her own daughter, the star dancer... but is she actually hurting her daughter by keeping her at the studio, instead of allowing her to pursue her career?

programme.title: Abby's Studio Rescue
programme.desc: Abby heads to Krystle Beck Dance Academy in Apple Valley, CA where she's immediately confronted by out of control dance moms battling it out in the middle of the studio's main lobby. Owner Krystle Beck is overwhelmed by the pushy moms and Abby must help her regain control of her studio before the owner is forced to close its doors.

programme.title: Abby's Studio Rescue
programme.desc: Abby heads to Penn Point Dance Academy in Bakersfield, CA, a family-run hip hop studio on the brink of financial ruin. Owner/operator E-baby is frustrated with his wife Michelle's inability to keep the studio running smoothly and the constant war between the different competition teams' dance moms, yet seems to be in total denial about the run down condition of the studio. Can Abby empower Michelle, fix up the studio, quell the dance mom drama and solve their billing problems in just four days?

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: The Ray family revolves around eight-year old daughter Asia's rising star, and this week there's a huge performance at World of Dance on the line.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: This week Asia is slated to perform at the Reality TV Awards, but tensions are already running high in the Ray household.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Asia's training goes into high gear, and with Shawn out of town, Kristie is overwhelmed--until a special visitor arrives to lend a hand.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Asia ramps up her training as an actress, singer and dancer but choreographer Anthony questions whether manager Billy is the right person to take Asia to the top.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: It's Bella's birthday and Kristie is determined to focus on her, while Asia struggles with the sacrifices she's forced to make for her career.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Billy lands Asia a gig opening for a pop star that no one has heard of and things quickly go south once they arrive at venue, only to discover it is a 21 and over nightclub.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Asia is heading to Vegas for her singing and dancing debut at Planet Hollywood.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Its Billy's big chance to prove that he has the chops to take Asia to the next level, but a major meltdown from Asia before her first singing performance at Planet Hollywood threatens to derail everything they've been working towards. Meanwhile, it's decision time--will Billy stay, or will he go?

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Anthony is determined to have full creative control over Asia's performance at the Long Beach Pride Festival. But after missing rehearsals, arguing with Shawn, and disobeying orders, Anthony is on thin ice. In a fraught rehearsal, Anthony drops the ball...and Asia! Facing possible injury as well as chaos on her team, will Asia even take the stage?

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Choreographer Ricky Palomino has given Asia the lead role in his theatrical performance titled "Daylight Come." Shawn decides that this week he and Kristie are going to have a "kid swap" and Shawn will handle Asia's career while Kristie takes on Bella's responsibilities. Will Shawn be able to prepare Asia on his own?

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: Billy books a performance for Asia at R&B legend El De Barge's birthday. Shawn puts Anthony in charge of vetoing this performance if he feels that Asia is not ready. Anthony feels empowered, but Shawn ultimately pulls rank. When Anthony explodes in frustration, both the performance as well as his place on Team Asia are put in jeopardy.

programme.title: Raising Asia
programme.desc: With her Universal City Walk performance only one week away, Asia is set to sing her new ballad on the web series, BiteSizeTV. As the pressure mounts, she loses focus and spins out of control just before show time, when Gina confides in Shawn that she feels unappreciated, leading Kristie to explode at the crew and threaten to pull the plug on Raising Asia.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: With the Dalton shut down, every haul road driver fights to make their delivery as the DOT scrambles to reopen the road.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: One driver walks away; Austin hauls an entire cabin; Jack battles oncoming traffic on a slick section of road; Lane Keator makes the call to put a South Carolina native in a convoy with Darrell Ward.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: On Manitoba's Winter Roads, Hugh Rowland and Rick Yemm's season is already on the brink of disaster.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: On the Dalton, everyone is gunning to be the new haul road ace, but Darrell s plan is derailed by a massive wreck that calls into question his reasons for being in Alaska.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: On the Dalton, Austin's trying to prove himself in a heavy haul convoy, but pushing the 100-ton modular building through blowing snow leads to a rookie mistake.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: In Canada, Alex Debogorski is trusted with a million dollar load, but at the start of his trip, the one lane mine road earns its reputation as one of the deadliest.

programme.desc: Rick returns to find the Winter Roads even more brutal and unforgiving than ever.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: As Dog likes to say, "it's not the years it's the miles," and this goes for both men and machines. Those long hunts and the rides to jail take a toll not only on Dog but also on his vehicles.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog, taking the day off to try his hand at coaching, assigns Tim and Leland to track down Emmanuel, a fugitive with terminal cancer who's got nothing to lose by running. Can the boys prove to Dog and Beth that they can handle a difficult job on their own?

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Bounty hunts are always full of surprises and that is very true today. Dog is in search of a potentially dangerous fugitive, he's only 19 and charged with kidnapping and menacing.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today the cameras are turned around.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to sweep the island clean of as many fugitives as he can in two days. Raymond, wanted on drug charges, is an easy grab. Mauro, wanted for solicitation, is busted.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team return to their roots, with a visit to their home town of Denver, Colorado. Dog and Tim begin the day with an early morning radio show appearance, and it pays off.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Kolani's on the run, left his wife to look after four kids and left Dog holding the bag for the $10k bond. Apparently the lure of the streets and other women have drawn him away from his commitments.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.desc: As Dog likes to say, "it's not the years it's the miles," and this goes for both men and machines. Those long hunts and the rides to jail take a toll not only on Dog but also on his vehicles.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Bounty hunts are always full of surprises and that is very true today. Dog is in search of a potentially dangerous fugitive, he's only 19 and charged with kidnapping and menacing.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today the cameras are turned around.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has a big problem. Patty Estabilio has jumped a $15,000 bail bond and disappeared into Hawaii's underworld. Kissing the kids good night, Dog and Beth, with Tim and Leland at their side, plunge into a drug-infused netherworld.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: No one becomes a bondsman overnight and even the members of Dog's team know there is always more to learn. So when Duane Lee cuts a felon a little too much slack about checking-in and then goes missing, Duane Lee knows he's gonna get schooled.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: What starts out as a perfect day for Dog turns ugly fast. He and Beth just bought bunnies for their kids, and Dog is enjoying helping them learn to care for their new pets. But duty calls and this is a tough case to fathom.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Back in Denver Dog discovers that recapturing the past can be more difficult then tracking down felons. On a day of more misses then hits in their fugitive hunting, Dog and Beth repeatedly collide with reminders of their early days.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Working for a bondswoman friend, Mary Ellen, Dog and his team hunt Chris, a fugitive wanted on drug charges. Dog turns over every rock, but to no avail.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after Virginia, a hard-to-find lawbreaker. He gets a tip that a pickup truck will be going to Virginia's house. In true private-eye fashion.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The "Big Island" of Hawaii boasts both lush tropical splendor and stark volcanic beauty. But today Dog and the team can't spend much time taking in the sights, they need to help Leland hunt down some elusive fugitives.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after a fugitive named Tracy who lives in a homeless shelter, but the shelter's staff is uncooperative, and the two sides get into an angry confrontation that forces Dog to temporarily back off.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog juggles his job and family responsibilities at the same time. He leads the search for Robert, a low-level drug dealer who makes money by selling hedge clippings as marijuana and broken Macadamia nuts as crack.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today Dog finds himself looking for more than one fugitive. He starts the day looking for a woman who has skipped out on her court date.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: There are few louder wake-up calls than coming-to in a jail cell with no idea how you got there. Add the media splashing the news of your arrest on every TV channel, and if your name is Lyssa Chapman you know you are in for a rough day.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is up in the high plains of Colorado helping a fellow bondman bring his most elusive fugitives to justice. When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has a big problem. Patty Estabilio has jumped a $15,000 bail bond and disappeared into Hawaii's underworld. Kissing the kids good night, Dog and Beth, with Tim and Leland at their side, plunge into a drug-infused netherworld.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: No one becomes a bondsman overnight and even the members of Dog's team know there is always more to learn. So when Duane Lee cuts a felon a little too much slack about checking-in and then goes missing, Duane Lee knows he's gonna get schooled.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: What starts out as a perfect day for Dog turns ugly fast. He and Beth just bought bunnies for their kids, and Dog is enjoying helping them learn to care for their new pets. But duty calls and this is a tough case to fathom.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Back in Denver Dog discovers that recapturing the past can be more difficult then tracking down felons. On a day of more misses then hits in their fugitive hunting, Dog and Beth repeatedly collide with reminders of their early days.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Working for a bondswoman friend, Mary Ellen, Dog and his team hunt Chris, a fugitive wanted on drug charges. Dog turns over every rock, but to no avail.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after Virginia, a hard-to-find lawbreaker. He gets a tip that a pickup truck will be going to Virginia's house. In true private-eye fashion.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after a fugitive named Tracy who lives in a homeless shelter, but the shelter's staff is uncooperative, and the two sides get into an angry confrontation that forces Dog to temporarily back off.

programme.title: Victim to Verdict: : The Prosecution Of Alec Baldwin
programme.desc: A look at the conclusion of actor Alec Baldwin's involuntary manslaughter trial after cinematographer Halyna Hutchins was shot and killed on the set of Western film "Rust."

programme.title: Victim To Verdict: The Killing of Ahmad Arbery
programme.desc: Ahmad Arbery was out jogging when three white men assumed he was a burglar, chased him down and shot him multiple times. Cellphone video captured by Arbery's assailants proved to the jury that these men were not the heroes they claimed to be.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: In Kokomo, Indiana an unthinkable crime terrified residents. A young woman was snatched from her home on a bright spring morning. Drops of blood and a torn window screen were all that was left to tell authorities what happened to the twenty-one year old victim. After several days of searching, a former FBI profiler narrowed the suspect list to one. Agents and detectives followed the trail across state lines hoping to find the victim before her time ran out.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: In 1980, the FBI began a massive undercover operation, code named Safebet, that was designed to expose the Chicago Mafia's infiltration into the city's surrounding suburbs. Undercover agents quickly discovered that the mob had its tentacles spread into every facet of the law enforcement community. They unwittingly uncovered the murder of a wealthy socialite perpetrated by a jealous and greedy mob lawyer and covered up by the local police chief.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: In January 1984, a U.S. Customs official disappears from his post near the Del Rio, Texas border crossing, prompting local police to search for four Latin American suspects driving a Pontiac Grand Prix. The following day, the Customs official was found dead. Two state troopers recovered the missing officer's service revolver after a fatal altercation with two men. Local police and the FBI continued searching for the suspect vehicle, prepared for a confrontation with desperate criminals.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: In Georgia, a series of bizarre shootings terrorizes the town of East Point. Two people are killed, and two are critically wounded. At first the shootings seem targeted, then they seem random. As the body count climbs, the killer taunts law enforcement with mysterious notes. Agents believe the shooter will continue until he is deador behind bars.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Frank Jude nearly lost his life when a group of drunken off-duty Milwaukee police officers brutalized him over a missing badge; his real fight would be taking on the Blue Wall of Silence in his quest for justice.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Julie Jensen suspected her husband and the father of her children Mark Jensen wanted her dead, so she put pen to paper telling the world just that; Mark Jensen's lawyer attempts to use that same letter to prove that Julie framed him.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: An Englishman uses household tools to commit murder; a woman is accused in the death of her husband.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: American college student Amanda Knox, studying abroad, finds herself facing a lifetime behind bars after her roommate is murdered.

programme.title: Forensic Justice
programme.desc: Eric Garner, a Staten Island father of six, is tragically killed when an NYPD officer puts Garner, into an illegal chokehold. Plus, Kevin Mitnick is one of the most famous hackers of all time. So famous, in fact, he’s hunted by the FBI.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: Texas teen Ethan Couch kills four people while drinking and driving and is sentenced only to probation.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: A Spanish court convicts 21 people for the Madrid subway train bombings, but acquits a lead suspect and six others.

programme.title: Corrupt Crimes
programme.desc: Diana Whipple is brutally mauled to death by dogs just outside her San Francisco apartment, and evidence leads to a murder trial.

programme.title: True Believers
programme.desc: Yogi Bhajan preaches family values and healthy living through Kundalini yoga, but abuse allegations tear a rift through families and across generations inside his spiritual empire.

programme.title: True Believers
programme.desc: Los Angeles' biggest rehab empire seems too good to be true, offering recovery, community and treatment on scholarship, but its patients get more than they bargained for.

programme.desc: A young, idealistic rookie for the West New York, N.J., Police Department discovers a pattern of pervasive criminal behavior within his department and decides to go under cover for the FBI.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: In tonight's programme Gordon finds a chef caught in a time warp when he tackles a picturesque but largely unfrequented upmarket restaurant in King's Lynn, a traditional market town on the Norfolk coast. For the last eighteen months ex Michelin-starred chef Nick has owned and run Rococo but his past success is now eluding him. The menu is past its sell-by date, the service is stuffy, the food is over-priced and the only thing being fed is his ego. Yet, despite debts of ~£100k and the prospect of putting his home at risk and his young family on the streets, Nick continues to cook comatose in a 1990s fantasy land of his own making.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: In tonight's final programme of the series Gordon grapples with girl power when he takes on an intimate family-run restaurant in the heart of WAG territory near Liverpool. For the last three years Morgan's has been run by antiques dealer-turned-restaurateur SANDY and her two daughters HELEN and LAURA. The beautifully-designed dining room has a prime high street location and should be the perfect eatery for the trendy local clientele. But Head Chef Phil is grappling with an eclectic menu that includes mashed potato with apricots and his cooking's just not up to it.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The venue for tonight's first programme is Ruby Tates in Brighton, owned and run by ex-actor and failed Hollywood wannabe ALLAN LOVE. Situated in an affluent and trendy area just one street back from the beach, it's an oyster bar and seafood restaurant but Allan's never tasted the food because he hates fish.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The venue for tonight's programme is The Priory, a 100-seater carvery in Haywards Heath, Sussex owned by ex IT consultant Scott. The former chapel of a nineteenth-century convent, the restaurant is in a spectacularly beautiful location and offers bargain roast dinners from a carvery that's been running for twenty years. Scott bought the place for £300k but with an ageing clientele eating for half-price, he's losing £5,000 a week.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: In tonight's programme Gordon finds a chef caught in a time warp when he tackles a picturesque but largely unfrequented upmarket restaurant in King's Lynn, a traditional market town on the Norfolk coast. For the last eighteen months ex Michelin-starred chef Nick has owned and run Rococo but his past success is now eluding him. The menu is past its sell-by date, the service is stuffy, the food is over-priced and the only thing being fed is his ego. Yet, despite debts of ~£100k and the prospect of putting his home at risk and his young family on the streets, Nick continues to cook comatose in a 1990s fantasy land of his own making.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: In tonight's final programme of the series Gordon grapples with girl power when he takes on an intimate family-run restaurant in the heart of WAG territory near Liverpool. For the last three years Morgan's has been run by antiques dealer-turned-restaurateur SANDY and her two daughters HELEN and LAURA. The beautifully-designed dining room has a prime high street location and should be the perfect eatery for the trendy local clientele. But Head Chef Phil is grappling with an eclectic menu that includes mashed potato with apricots and his cooking's just not up to it.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The venue for tonight's second programme is Piccolo Teatro, a bijou vegetarian restaurant in Paris run by feisty Scot Rachel. A former waitress at the restaurant, Rachel bought it three years ago and now, along with best friend Stephanie, she's trying to convert the carnivorous French into a nation of veggies. For Gordon it's a sentimental journey to the city where he spent his formative years as a chef, a food mecca full of gastronomic delights that should be a dream.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The venue for tonight's penultimate programme is The Curry Lounge in Nottingham, the city with more restaurants per square mile than any other in Britain. This 120-seater Indian restaurant has been run since January by ex sales director Raz who's new to the business - and it shows. Despite a ~500k refurbishment and décor like a Bollywood set the honeymoon period's well and truly over. His once-healthy trade is evaporating and at his current rate of loss it's uncertain he'll make it past Christmas.

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: Examining if modern technology and scientific knowledge can help protect people from almost anything, including natural disasters, or if vulnerability remains a factor.

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: Will we ever find the answers? Or, might these structures have been intentionally constructed to perpetually mystify us?

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: All over the world, there are giant monoliths that ancient ancestors carved out of solid rock.

programme.title: The UnXplained
programme.desc: For decades, the debate has raged as to what exactly unidentified flying objects really are; theories have been put forth that attribute UFOs to everything from secret military aircraft to weather phenomena and more.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: When the team works with a group of astronomy experts to conduct a telescope and rocket experiment at the Triangle Area on Skinwalker Ranch, they have their most incredible UAP encounter yet.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Former NIDS employee and retired Army Col. John Alexander visits the ranch; after the Skinwalker team repeat an experiment that he indicates may have opened a portal, they receive a mysterious signal that appears to be an attempt to communicate.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: While uncovering evidence of a massive underground cave system said to exist beneath the ranch's mysterious mesa, the Skinwalker team also broadcasts a strange signal recorded on the property over the airwaves of a local radio station.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: As the team drills into the solid rock mesa on Skinwalker Ranch, they discover a mysterious void containing an impenetrable object that causes one of the most dangerous and threatening happenings they've experienced so far.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: After recovering metal fragments from a massive, dome-shaped object buried in the mesa on Skinwalker Ranch, the team conducts a scientific test that reveals shocking results.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: When the team conducts its most ambitious experiment yet at the Triangle, it is shocked by what appears in the sky above Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: With winter approaching and time running out, the team performs a three-dimensional scan of Skinwalker Ranch and makes an incredible discovery that may help explain some of the bizarre phenomena they have encountered on the property.

programme.title: In Search of Aliens
programme.desc: Ancient Astronaut Theory has existed in popular culture for nearly 50 years, asking the question whether extraterrestrials visited Earth in the remote past.

programme.title: In Search of Aliens
programme.desc: The Loch Ness Monster is one of the world's most enduring mysteries. But there have also been accounts of similar cryptids all over the planet.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside America's UFO Investigation
programme.desc: A former U.S. Navy radar operator emerges from the shadows to reveal the terrifying day it rained UFOs.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside America's UFO Investigation
programme.desc: Everything we know about UFOS has changed. Now, the all-star team that got the U.S Navy to admit UFOs are real launches a new season of investigations.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside America's UFO Investigation
programme.desc: The team investigates an alarming pattern of UFOS allegedly appearing near US.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside America's UFO Investigation
programme.desc: In 2017, Tom Delonge and Lue Elizondo helped engineer the release of 3 videos captured by U.S Navy fighter pilots of "Tic Tac UFOs."

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside America's UFO Investigation
programme.desc: Lue Elizondo calls on a new technology to analyze a series of UFO videos all recorded in 2019.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
